text: Oscar Holderer (November 4, 1919 â€“ May 5, 2015) was an engineer who worked with Wernher von Braun in the United States and Germany beforehand. Holderer came to the United States as part of the second group of people brought from Germany during World War II as part of Operation Paperclip. ==References== Category:1920s births Category:2015 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:German aerospace engineers Category:Scientists from Huntsville, Alabama
title: Oscar Holderer
